textBeforeTable: W3C Specifications This page keeps track of the different XML-related specifications the ITS Interest Group has reviewed or is reviewing, looking at ITS-specific issues. It also includes review made by the ITS Working Group.  ITS IG Home   I18N Home  ITS Interest Group Reviews of Specifications
